title: Fix navigation bug
body: Fix the bug in the navigation bar - Hover, Pixels, Scattering, color, etc.

title: Release new website
body: Release the new website - The new website is a website that is designed to be used by the mesh company. The website will be used to display the company's products and services.

title: Change button color
body: Change the color of the button - The button color is not in the palette.

title: Deploy server on acceptance environment
body: Deploy the server on the acceptance environment - The server is not deployed on the acceptance environment.

title: Change layout for the content page
body: Change the layout for the content page - The layout is not correct.

title: Complete the registration flow
body: Complete the registration flow - The registration flow is not complete.

title: Create new database instance
body: Create a new database instance - The database instance is not created.
